item.title: 特朗普任命坎托菲茨杰拉德的卢特尼克为商务部长
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普将任命 Cantor Fitzgerald LP 首席执行官霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）领导商务部，这将是一个可能以全面提高关税提案为导向的政府的核心人选。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump is tapping Cantor Fitzgerald LP chief executive officer Howard Lutnick to lead the Commerce Department, a central pick in an administration that will likely be shaped by sweeping tariff hike proposals.】

item.title: 土耳其寄希望于特朗普解决S-400争端并购买F-35战机
item.description: 在等待乔-拜登总统采取行动多年之后，土耳其寄希望于当选总统唐纳德-特朗普能解除对其使用俄罗斯防空系统的制裁。【原文：After waiting years for action from President Joe Biden, Turkey is pinning its hopes on President-elect Donald Trump to free it from sanctions over its use of a Russian air defense system.】

item.title: 霸菱称公共和私人资产信贷正在融合
item.description: 霸菱有限责任公司（Barings LLC）最近合并了其资产融资的公共和私人投资团队，该公司称这一组织变革将有助于其驾驭公共和私人信贷市场之间日益模糊的界限。【原文：Barings LLC recently combined its public and private investing teams for asset-based finance, an organizational change it says will help it navigate the increasingly blurred lines between public and private credit markets.】

item.title: 银河公司的索恩说：比特币 ETF 期权将降低波动性
item.description: Galaxy Digital 公司的亚历克斯-索恩（Alex Thorn）认为，价值 430 亿美元的 iShares 比特币信托基金的期权可能会降低波动性，增加原始加密货币的投资者基础。【原文：The availability of options on the sector leading $43 billion iShares Bitcoin Trust is likely to reduce volatility and increase the investor base for the original cryptocurrency, according to Galaxy Digital’s Alex Thorn.】

item.title: 俄罗斯的核理论是什么？普京是如何改变这一理论的？
item.description: 俄罗斯军事战术的一个显著特点是不排除在常规战争中使用核武器。【原文：A distinctive feature of Russia’s military tactics has been that it doesn’t rule out using nuclear weapons in a conventional war.】

item.title: 战略转型：Salesforce 计划在收购公司裁员
item.description: Salesforce Inc. 正计划裁减 Own 公司的员工，该公司是 Salesforce 以约 20 亿美元收购的数据管理初创公司。【原文：Salesforce Inc. is planning to cut workers at Own, the data management startup it acquired for about $2 billion.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会主席称仍在评估美国国债海外清算问题
item.description: 美国最高衍生品监管机构仍在评估在海外清算美国国债的风险，这一结果可能会影响 Cantor Fitzgerald LP 首席执行官 Howard Lutnick 与 CME Group Inc.【原文：The top US derivatives regulator is still assessing the risks of clearing US Treasuries abroad, an outcome that could impact plans by Cantor Fitzgerald LP Chief Howard Lutnick to compete with CME Group Inc.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司 10 亿美元的垃圾债券交易提供了债券优惠
item.description: 市政债券市场的滞后运行为渴望获得额外收益的公司债券投资者提供了机会。【原文：The municipal-bond market’s lagging run is opening up an opportunity for corporate-debt investors eager to secure extra yield.】

item.title: T.罗威公司因2025年通胀波动性而削减高等级信贷赌注
item.description: T.罗尔-普莱斯集团公司（T Rowe Price Group Inc.【原文：T. Rowe Price Group Inc. is in risk-off form in parts of the credit markets, anticipating pressure on yields from higher inflation next year will make the stability of bank loans preferable to the volatility of bonds.】

item.title: 拉詹告诉美国：遏制债务，为下一次大流行做好准备
item.description: 印度储备银行前行长拉古拉姆-拉詹（Raghuram Rajan）说，在一个比以前更容易发生流行病的世界里，不能任由美国和其他国家的高额公共债务继续恶化。【原文：High public debt can’t be left to fester in the US and its peers in a world that is prone to more pandemics than before, former Reserve Bank of India governor Raghuram Rajan said.】

item.title: 睡眠国度考虑在罕见的杠杆收购中出售潜在债券
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，睡乡加拿大控股公司（Sleep Country Canada Holdings Inc.【原文：Sleep Country Canada Holdings Inc. is talking to investors about a potential Canadian-dollar bond sale to finance its C$1.7 billion acquisition by Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd. in what would be a rare leveraged buyout funded by loonie-denominated bonds, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 股价下跌，法国燃料分销商鲁比斯（Rubis）被指将探索出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国燃料分销商 Rubis SCA 正在探索包括潜在出售在内的各种选择，在此之前，该公司股价在过去六年中下跌了一半以上。【原文：French fuel distributor Rubis SCA is exploring options including a potential sale, according to people familiar with the matter, after its shares slumped by more than half over the past six years.】

item.title: Blackstone 看好证券化市场对 Jersey Mike's 的收购
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正考虑利用证券化债务市场为其收购 Jersey Mike's 的多数股权融资。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering tapping the securitized debt market to help finance its acquisition of a majority stake in Jersey Mike’s, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 微软与新闻集团旗下哈珀柯林斯签订人工智能学习协议
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，微软公司与新闻集团旗下的哈珀-柯林斯公司达成协议，允许这家软件公司使用该图书出版商的非小说类图书来训练其人工智能模型。【原文：Microsoft Corp. reached a deal with News Corp.’s HarperCollins that will allow the software company to use nonfiction titles from the book publisher to train its artificial intelligence models, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: SGS 首席执行官 Picaud 表示将通过收购加速增长
item.description: 全球最大的工业测试公司 SGS SA 首席执行官表示，该公司希望通过收购实现更快增长。【原文：SGS SA, the world’s largest industrial testing firm, expects to grow faster through acquisitions, according to the company’s chief executive.】

item.title: 南希-梅斯因众议院通过反变性决议而被称为 "恶霸
item.description: 共和党众议员南希-梅斯（Nancy Mace）在提出一项决议，阻止首位变性议员萨拉-麦克布莱德（Sarah McBride）使用国会大厦的女厕所后，正面临欺凌和偏执的批评；此举很可能是为了迎合唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的保守派基础。【原文：Republican Representative Nancy Mace is facing criticisms of bullying and bigotry after filing a resolution that would prevent the first transgender member of the chamber, Sarah McBride, from using the women’s restroom in the Capitol — a move that’s likely a bid to appeal to Donald Trump’s conservative base.】

item.title: 美国财政部指出任何新的跨境支付系统都存在风险
item.description: 美国财政部一位高级官员警告说，任何跨境支付系统如果不遵守旨在最大限度减少非法活动的标准，都会给国际金融稳定和经济安全带来潜在风险。【原文：A senior US Treasury official warned about potential risks to international financial stability and economic security from any cross-border payments systems that fail to adhere to standards aimed at minimizing illicit activity.】

item.title: 诺基亚在分析师预测 T-Mobile 将更换供应商后下跌
item.description: 在一位分析师预测 T-Mobile 美国公司将更换网络供应商后，诺基亚公司股价创下近一年来最大跌幅。【原文：Nokia Oyj shares fell the most in almost a year after an analyst predicted that T-Mobile US Inc. would switch network suppliers.】

item.title: 信贷业的疯狂时代再次来临
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: CDPQ 任命 John Lewis 前主席 Sharon White 为欧洲区负责人
item.description: 根据一份内部备忘录，魁北克公共养老基金管理公司已任命 Sharon White 为董事总经理兼欧洲区负责人。【原文：Quebec’s public pension fund manager has appointed Sharon White as managing director and head of Europe for the firm, according to an internal memo.】

item.title: 英格兰银行最新利率制定者显示鸽派倾向
item.description: 英国央行最新利率制定者艾伦-泰勒（Alan Taylor）表示，如果经济疲软，英国央行的降息速度可能会快于市场预期。【原文：The Bank of England may cut interest rates faster than markets are betting if the economy weakens, according to its newest rate-setter Alan Taylor.】

item.title: 监督机构称，特鲁多政府可能已经吹响了财政号角
item.description: 加拿大预算监督机构称，贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）政府很可能已经越过了自我设置的财政警戒线，并就推迟公布最终支出和收入数字的后果发出警告。【原文：Canada’s budgetary watchdog says Justin Trudeau’s government has likely blown past a self-imposed fiscal guardrail, and is warning about the consequences of delaying the release of final spending and revenue numbers.】

item.title: 中国阿里巴巴自 2021 年以来首次发行美元债券
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. ）近四年来首次公开发行美元债券，这是该中国互联网巨头为偿还海外债务和回购股权而进行的双币种交易的一部分。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is marketing its first public dollar bonds in nearly four years, part of a dual-currency transaction by the Chinese internet heavyweight to repay offshore debt and repurchase equity.】

item.title: 据说 Cirsa 和 HBX 集团计划于 2025 年上半年在西班牙上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，赌场运营商 Cirsa Enterprises 和旅游技术公司 HBX 集团正准备最快于明年上半年在西班牙进行首次公开募股。【原文：Casino operator Cirsa Enterprises and travel technology firm HBX Group are preparing to launch initial public offerings in Spain as soon as the first half of next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Intuit 和 H&R Block 因报告称 "国家税务总局 "对税务应用程序感兴趣而下跌
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的 "政府效率部 "领导人讨论了为美国人创建一种新的报税方式，Intuit 公司和 H&R Block 公司的股价周二下跌。【原文：Intuit Inc. and H&R Block Inc. shares fell on Tuesday, after the Washington Post reported that the leaders of President-elect Donald Trump’s “Department of Government Efficiency” discussed creating a new way for Americans to file their taxes.】

item.title: 迎合提前退休者的 "FIRE "ETF 首次亮相
item.description: 对许多人来说，这只是一个白日梦，但有一种趋势主张赚取和储蓄足够的钱，以辞去没有灵魂的日常工作，提前退休，这激发了一对新的 ETF。【原文：It’s a pipedream for many, but a trend that espouses making and saving enough money to quit a soulless day job and retire early has inspired a pair of new ETFs.】

item.title: 联邦存款保险公司主席马丁-格鲁恩伯格计划于一月卸任
item.description: 联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp）总裁马丁-格伦伯格（Martin Gruenberg）将于 1 月 19 日卸任。【原文：Martin Gruenberg, the head of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp., will step down on Jan. 19.】

item.title: 州级数据表明美国薪资疲软可能只是暂时的
item.description: 在两次飓风和波音公司大罢工的影响下，佛罗里达州和华盛顿州上个月的就业人数有所下降，这进一步证明全国招聘数据的大幅回落很可能是暂时的。【原文：Employment fell in Florida and Washington last month amid two hurricanes and a major strike at Boeing Co., adding to evidence that the significant pullback seen in the national hiring data is likely temporary.】

item.title: 顶级银行称西班牙山洪暴发将导致 2024 年 GDP 增长下降
item.description: 据西班牙储蓄银行（CaixaBank SA）称，西班牙最近发生的造成 200 多人死亡的洪灾将使今年的经济增长预期降低多达 20 个基点。【原文：Spain’s recent floods, which killed more than 200 people, will trim as much as 20 basis points off the expected economic growth this year, according to CaixaBank SA.】

item.title: 乐金咖啡巴西咖啡豆交易确保中国需求稳定
item.description: 中国的乐金咖啡公司（Luckin Coffee Inc.【原文：China’s Luckin Coffee Inc. agreed to buy an equivalent of 4 million bags of beans from the world’s top exporter Brazil between 2025 and 2029, signaling continued demand from one of the fastest growing markets.】
